topic.title: how to backup personal info to migrate to other pc?
topic.body: do i need to backup whole folder or just a few crucial files? thx

1_1UfvLnMuzShvi3phWGSqn79tio81Wn9Dt.body: 增加个中文界面就更好了，虽然我用英文完全ok

1_1KwF7Y9SQ6BeLSgAST4Et56X7v1RGEsNEz.body:
> [erkan](#comment_97_1H8oKiRa7fGgUqS1hpUtaSYLvAqkaknbkf): In theory only this one (1).But it doesn't hurt to backup all first, until you have verified that (1) works...
> (1) http://zeronet.readthedocs.org/en/latest/faq/#can-i-use-the-same-username-on-multiple-machine

good answer, thx
